scripts.build: yarn build:plugins && yarn typecheck:scripts && yarn typecheck:tests
scripts.build:plugins: yarn workspace @unflakable/js-api build && yarn workspace @unflakable/jest-plugin build
scripts.typecheck:tests: yarn workspace jest-integration typecheck && yarn workspace jest-integration-input typecheck
scripts.publish: yarn workspace @unflakable/js-api npm publish --access public && yarn workspace @unflakable/jest-plugin npm publish --access public
